interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/06/09
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Israel Horovitz'], 'Producers': ['Rachael Horovitz', 'Gary Foster', 'Nitsa Benchetrit', 'David C. Barrot'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Kline', 'Kristin Scott Thomas', 'Maggie Smith'], 'Studio': ['Universal Pictures']}
Review Text: There are redeeming moments in this movie, but they're rather few and far between.  Overall it is enjoyable and worth watching, but the acting is lukewarm and the plot drags along clumsily at times.  All 3 of the main actors are capable of much better work.  The supporting actors aren't bad, though.
Review Title: Middle of the road...
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
